mapper.sql: ID, ACTIVITYID, MOBILE, MEMBERID, PERSONNUMBER, PAYMONEY, PAYSTATUS, ORDERNUMBER, PAYTIME, TRANSACTIONID, CHECKTIME
mapper.insert: insert into PAYINFO (ID, ACTIVITYID, MOBILE, MEMBERID, PERSONNUMBER, PAYMONEY, PAYSTATUS, ORDERNUMBER, PAYTIME, TRANSACTIONID, CHECKTIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activityid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{personnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paystatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{transactionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checktime,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.update:
update PAYINFO
ACTIVITYID = #{activityid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBERID = #{memberid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PERSONNUMBER = #{personnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAYMONEY = #{paymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAYSTATUS = #{paystatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORDERNUMBER = #{ordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYTIME = #{paytime,jdbcType=DATE},
TRANSACTIONID = #{transactionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update PAYINFO set ACTIVITYID = #{activityid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBERID = #{memberid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PERSONNUMBER = #{personnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAYMONEY = #{paymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAYSTATUS = #{paystatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORDERNUMBER = #{ordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYTIME = #{paytime,jdbcType=DATE}, TRANSACTIONID = #{transactionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select t.collectid from APPLY_ACTIVITY_COLLECT t where t.memberid = #{memberid}
select count(*) from PayInfo where memberID = #{memberid}
